name: BrokenLore: FOLLOW Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit +
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2600X, Core i5-8600
  • Graphics: AMD RX 5700, GTX 1070
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit +
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5600X, Core i5-11600K
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 6700 XT, Geforce RTX 2070
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: BrokenLore: FOLLOW is a psychological first-person horror game that immerses players in the haunting narrative of Anne, as she grapples with issues of self-acceptance, bullying, and worthlessness while encountering metaphorical surreal creatures that heighten the terror of her journey.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Indonesian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
